title: ICE: assertion failed: !is_undef(val)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
code:

``` rust
#![crate_type="rlib"]
fn test() -> (u8,) {
    (-1.0 as u8,)
}
```

output:
